casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Andre Levern MILLER. No. 309A08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 3, 2008. Paul F. Herzog, Fayetteville, for Miller. Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 661 S.E.2d 770.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of July 2008 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of July 2008."
